Value.DefaultValue: [{"shortcut":"Default MacOS - Custom Command","script":"open 'https://www.google.com'","description":"This is a custom command that opens a URL in the default web browser on MacOS"},{"shortcut":"Default Linux - Custom Command","script":"xdg-open 'https://www.google.com'","description":"This is a custom command that opens a URL in the default web browser on Linux"},{"shortcut":"Default Windows - Custom Command","script":"start 'https://www.google.com'","description":"This is a custom command that opens a URL in the default web browser on Windows"}]
Value.Label: Shortcuts
Value.Tooltip: Shortcuts to be used in the plugin
